trans-unit.source: Provides static methods for creating tuple objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供用於建立 Tuple 物件的靜態方法。

trans-unit.source: A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of elements.
trans-unit.target: Tuple 是具有特定數目的項目序列的資料結構。

trans-unit.source: An example of a tuple is a data structure with three elements (known as a 3-tuple or triple) that is used to store an identifier such as a person's name in the first element, a year in the second element, and the person's income for that year in the third element.
trans-unit.target: Tuple 的範例是具有三個項目 （又稱為 3 tuple 或三重物件） 用來儲存識別碼，例如，某個人的名稱在第一個項目，在第二個元素，且該人員的 income 該年份的第三個項目中之年的資料結構。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework directly supports tuples with one to seven elements.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會直接支援一到七個元素的 tuple。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can create tuples of eight or more elements by nesting tuple objects in the <xref:System.Tuple%608.Rest%2A> property of a <xref:System.Tuple%608> object.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以建立八個或多個元素 tuple，藉由巢狀中的 tuple 物件<xref:System.Tuple%608.Rest%2A>屬性<xref:System.Tuple%608>物件。

trans-unit.source: Tuples are commonly used in four ways:
trans-unit.target: 中四種方法通常會使用 Tuple:

trans-unit.source: To represent a single set of data.
trans-unit.target: 代表單一的資料集。

trans-unit.source: For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，tuple 可以代表資料庫記錄，而其元件可以表示個別欄位的記錄。

trans-unit.source: To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set.
trans-unit.target: 提供讓您輕鬆存取、 和操作的資料集。

trans-unit.source: To return multiple values from a method without using `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要從方法傳回多個值，而不使用`out`參數 （在 C#) 或`ByRef`參數 （在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要將多個值傳遞至方法，以透過單一參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup time.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法具有單一參數，可讓您提供一個執行緒在啟動時執行之方法的值。

trans-unit.source: If you supply a <xref:System.Tuple%603> object as the method argument, you can supply the thread’s startup routine with three items of data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提供<xref:System.Tuple%603>物件做為方法引數中，您可以提供資料的三個項目在執行緒啟動常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Tuple> class does not itself represent a tuple.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Tuple>類別不能本身代表 tuple。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is a class that provides static methods for creating instances of the tuple types that are supported by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它會提供用於建立 tuple 類型支援.NET Framework 的執行個體的靜態方法的類別。

trans-unit.source: It provides helper methods that you can call to instantiate tuple objects without having to explicitly specify the type of each tuple component.
trans-unit.target: 它提供 helper 方法，您可以呼叫 tuple 物件的具現化，而不需要明確指定 tuple 中的每個元件的類型。

trans-unit.source: Although you can create an instance of a tuple class by calling its class constructor, the code to do so can be cumbersome.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以藉由呼叫其類別建構函式建立 tuple 類別的執行個體，若要這樣做的程式碼可能會相當繁雜。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a class constructor to create a 7-tuple or septuple that contains population data for New York City for each census from 1950 through 2000.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用類別建構函式建立 7 tuple 或 7-tuple，包含每個人口普查 1950 到 2000 New York City 的母體擴展資料。

trans-unit.source: Creating the same tuple object by using a helper method is more straightforward, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 使用 helper 方法來建立相同的 tuple 物件很更簡單，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Tuple.Create%2A> helper methods directly support the creation of tuple objects that have from one to eight components (that is, singletons through octuples).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Tuple.Create%2A> Helper 方法會直接支援有一到八個元件 (也就是透過 octuples singleton) 的 tuple 物件的建立。

trans-unit.source: Although there is no practical limit to the number of components a tuple may have, helper methods are not available to create a tuple with nine or more components.
trans-unit.target: 雖然沒有元件數目沒有實際限制可能會有一個 tuple，helper 方法並不適用於建立 tuple 的九個或多個元件。

trans-unit.source: To create such a tuple, you must call the <xref:System.Tuple%608.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立這類 tuple，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Tuple%608.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: For additional information and examples that use tuples, see the documentation for the individual tuple types in the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊和範例，使用 tuple，請參閱.NET Framework 中的個別 tuple 類型的文件。

trans-unit.source: These are listed in the See Also section at the end of this topic.
trans-unit.target: 這些必要條件列於本主題結尾的 < 另請參閱區段。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an 8-tuple (octuple) that contains prime numbers that are less than 20.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立 8 個 tuple (octuple)，其中包含會小於 20 的質數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new tuple object.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 Tuple 物件。

trans-unit.target: Tuple 之唯一元件的類型。

trans-unit.target: Tuple 之唯一元件的值。

trans-unit.target: 值為 (<paramref name="item1" />) 的 Tuple。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Tuple.Create%2A> 是 helper 方法，您可以呼叫來執行個體化 1 tuple 物件，而不需要明確指定其元件的類型。

trans-unit.target: Tuple 之第 8 個元件的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new 8-tuple, or octuple.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 8-tuple 或八重 (Octuple) 物件。

trans-unit.source: An 8-tuple (octuple) whose value is (<paramref name="item1" />, <paramref name="item2" />, <paramref name="item3" />, <paramref name="item4" />, <paramref name="item5" />, <paramref name="item6" />, <paramref name="item7" />, <paramref name="item8" />).
trans-unit.target: 值為 (<paramref name="item1" />、<paramref name="item2" />、<paramref name="item3" />、<paramref name="item4" />、<paramref name="item5" />、<paramref name="item6" />、<paramref name="item7" />、<paramref name="item8" />) 的 8-Tuple 或八重 (Octuple)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Tuple.Create%2A> is a helper method that you can call to instantiate an 8-tuple without having to explicitly specify the types of its components.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Tuple.Create%2A> 是 helper 方法，您可以呼叫來執行個體化 8 tuple，而不需要明確指定其元件的類型。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Tuple%608.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor to create a tuple with nine or more components unless your language provides a special syntax for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Tuple%608.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>建構函式來建立具有九個或多個元件的 tuple，除非您的語言提供此用途的特殊語法。

trans-unit.source: The static (`Shared` in Visual Basic) methods of the <xref:System.Tuple> class cannot be used to create a tuple with nine or more components.
trans-unit.target: 靜態 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 的方法<xref:System.Tuple>類別不能用來建立九個或多個元件的 tuple。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an 8-tuple whose components are prime numbers that are less than 20.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立其元件是質數小於 20 的 8 個 tuple。

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to the following example, which uses the <xref:System.Tuple%608> class constructor instead of the <xref:System.Tuple.Create%2A> factory creation method.
trans-unit.target: 這相當於下列的範例中，使用<xref:System.Tuple%608>類別建構函式，而不是<xref:System.Tuple.Create%2A>factory 建立方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that instantiating a <xref:System.Tuple%608> object in this way involves considerably more code, because you must declare a nested <xref:System.Tuple%601> object as the <xref:System.Tuple%608> object's eighth component to produce an octuple.
trans-unit.target: 請注意 該具現化<xref:System.Tuple%608>以這種方式的物件包含了相當多的程式碼，因為您必須宣告巢狀<xref:System.Tuple%601>物件當做<xref:System.Tuple%608>產生 octuple 物件的第八個元件。
